body_html:
Hi iNLyze, I got the same problem as you.
The point is here :

name: GeForce GTX 1070
major: 6 minor: 1 memoryClockRate (GHz) 1.683
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 7.91GiB
Free memory: 148.69MiB

Total memory we have is 7.91GiB, but available is only 148.69MiB.
This mean that our vram has been allocated to other places.
So before we run the code, just add :

import os
os.system('export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=""')

or do it in your command line like this :

export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=""

to release all your devices using vram, then well done !

body:
Hi iNLyze, I got the same problem as you.
The point is here :

name: GeForce GTX 1070
major: 6 minor: 1 memoryClockRate (GHz) 1.683
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 7.91GiB
Free memory: 148.69MiB

Total memory we have is 7.91GiB, but available is only 148.69MiB.
This mean that our vram has been allocated to other places.
So before we run the code, just add : 

import os
os.system('export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=""')

or do it in your command line like this : 

export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=""

to release all your devices using vram, then well done !
